about_the_game:
Capybara Carbonara is a whacky-physics-adventure, where you play as mischievous Capybara destined to cause mayhem and destruction all around. The Zoo you're trapped in is in the business of serving up animals to their visitors: Panda Pudding, Thai Green Tiger... Capybara Carbonara? Use a sandbox arsenal of wacky items, weaponry and vehicles to take on the Zoo Keepers, free the animals and just generally restore peace to the universe.

Including such shenanigans as:

  • Playing as a ̶d̶e̶l̶i̶c̶i̶o̶u̶s̶ adorable Capybara!
  • Exploring a variety of Zoos (with secrets to be found!)
  • Completing hundreds of quests in the Task Journal
  • Discovering way too many whacky items, weapons and vehicles! (Ever fire a Rocket Launcher while riding a Unicycle?)
  • Driving vehicles that some animals were never designed to drive in! (Golf Cart anyone?)
  • Ear waggle abilities
  • Buying special items and cheats from the "Trash Panda Super Store!"
  • And much more...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 @ 3.1 GHz or AMD FX-6300 @ 3.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 670 or AMD R9 270 (2GB VRAM with Shader Model 5.0 or better)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770 @ 3.4 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 1600 @ 3.2 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD R9 290X (4GB VRAM with Shader Model 5.0 or better)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Trapped in a Zoo which cooks and prepares its own animals to serve up, Capy the mischievous Capybara is ready to cause mayhem and destruction to take the Zoo down in this wacky adventure!
